sentences.sentence: Rishi Sunak is the UK's new Prime Minister after securing support from more than half of Conservative MPs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Rishi Sunak will be the UK's next prime minister after Penny Mordaunt confirms she has dropped out of the leadership race.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The former chancellor had secured the backing of well over half of Tory MPs and was the only candidate remaining who had reached the support threshold.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Penny Mordaunt said in a statement that it was clear that colleagues felt they needed certainty and urged the Conservative Party to unite behind Sunak.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Forrest Johnson's sudden decision to rule himself out the race to replace Liz Truss surprised many.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: In a statement on Sunday he insisted he did have enough support, but he had decided it was not the right thing to do.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: He conceded he would struggle to unite his party in Parliament.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Rishi Sunak, who will become Britain's first ever Hindu Prime Minister, enters Downing Street at a time of extreme economic difficulty in the UK.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Sunak must now visit King Charles III, who is expected to formally ask Sunak to form a government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The UK's next leader, Rishi Sunak, will be the youngest Prime Minister in over 200 years and the first Hindu to ever take office.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Russian Defense Minister Sergei Shoigu has accused Ukraine of planning to detonate a

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: radioactive dirty bomb and blame it on Moscow. Shoigu discussed what he described as the rapidly deteriorating situation in the Ukraine war over phone calls with NATO nations on Sunday. Without providing evidence Shoigu told his French, British and Turkish counterparts of Russia's concerns, issuing a statement after his phone calls. A dirty bomb is a device that uses explosives to scatter radioactive waste. It does not have the devastating effect of a nuclear explosion but it could expose large populations to radioactive contamination.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Shoigu also held phone talks with US Secretary of Defense Lloyd Austin for the first time since May.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In his nightly address, Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelensky immediately hit back, accusing Moscow of blatant lies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: He says if Russia calls and says that Ukraine is allegedly preparing something, it only means one thing. Russia has already prepared it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: I believe that now the world should react as harshly as possible.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, the situation in Kyiv remains tense.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And whatever the likelihood of a dirty bomb attack, the back-and-forth accusations hold their own dangers of escalation.

The think tank also reiterated that Russian forces are likely preparing to destroy the dam at the Kachovka hydroelectric power plant, flooding and widening the Dnipro River to delay any Ukrainian advances.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: They are likely attempting to moderate the resultant flooding, claiming they are lowering the volume of water from the reservoir behind the dam to minimize damage.

Russian forces conducted massive missile and drone attacks to degrade Ukrainian energy infrastructure hitting the regions of Volyn, Rivne, Kharkiv, Kirovograd, Cherkasy, Zaporizhia, Odessa and Mykolaiv.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Eight months into the full-scale invasion, the Institute for the Study of War says ongoing Russian strikes on Ukrainian civilian infrastructure are extraordinarily unlikely to erode the Ukrainian will to fight, but will increasingly pose an economic and humanitarian challenge for Ukraine as temperatures drop.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Under the rubble of Izium Hospital in eastern Ukraine, there are real examples of resilience.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: This medical facility was the only one to stay open when Russian troops overran the city in early March, not long after the invasion began.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Surgeries moved to the basement to avoid airstrikes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Just a handful of doctors, nurses, paramedics and pathologists remained.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Now they prepare for the winter, after six deadly months under Russian occupation, drawing upon their harsh experiences.

Through an informal meeting, the pair discussed various European issues, including energy, migration and Ukraine in a tweet afterwards McCraw said the pair had apparently vowed to work together with dialogue and ambition as Europeans and neighbors earlier Maloney who's Italy's first female prime minister was sworn in as the country formed its first far-right government since World War two. Maloney's Brothers of Italy party, which has neo-fascist roots, came first in last month's national election.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But it didn't win enough votes to govern outright, meaning Maloney had to turn to her two main right-wing allies, Matteo Salvini and former prime minister Silvio Berlusconi.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The women-led protests in Iran entered their sixth week on Sunday as university students braved a military crackdown to challenge the government by holding rallies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: However, clashes broke out between police and students at a prominent university where male and female students on Saturday had sat next to each other at the university's restaurant in defiance of the gender segregation rules of the Islamic Republic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile there have been solidarity protests including one in Washington DC where thousands of people, many of them Iranian, marched chanting justice for Iran and carrying banners that read, women, life, freedom.

sentences.sentence: My brothers and sisters back in Iran, they are on the streets, they are fighting for their life.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Right-wing former Foreign Minister Andrzej Logar has won the most votes in Slovenia's first round presidential election.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But he will face his centre-left rival Natasha Peirce-Mussar in a run-off. Electors in the small Alpine EU country of 2 million people chose from seven candidates standing for the largely ceremonial post. A second round will now take place in November.

sentences.sentence: Thousands of climate protesters marched through the streets of Brussels on Sunday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The demonstration came two weeks before the UN COP27 climate change conference in Egypt.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
